column1: The S&P CNX Nifty closed at 3921.2 points on September 30, 2008 representing a decrease of 438.8 pts points (-10.06%), as compared to 4360 points on August 29, 2008 . During the month of September 2008, S&P CNX Nifty touched a high of 4558 points on September 08, 2008 before closing at 3921.2 points on September 30, 2008 . The market capitalisation of  S&P CNX Nifty decreased from Rs.2639434 crores on August 29, 2008, to Rs.2406508 crores on September 30, 2008 i.e. a decrease of Rs.232926 crores (-8.82%)
* Beta & R2 are calculated for the period 01-October-2007 to 30-September-2008
* Beta measures the  degree to which any portfolio of stocks is affected as compared to the effect
on the market as a whole.
* The coefficient of determination (R2) measures the strength of relationship between two variables
the return on  a security versus that of the market.
* Volatility is the Std. deviation of the daily returns for the period 01-September-2008 to 30-September-2008
* Last day of trading was 30 September-2008
* Impact Cost for S&P CNX Nifty is for a portfolio of Rs. 50 Lakhs
* Impact Cost for S&P CNX Nifty is the weightage average impact cost
